title: First Publication !
content:
My first research work on Methane Activation, [Improved Prediction for the Methane Activation Mechanism on Rutile Metal Oxides by a Machine Learning Model with Geometrical Descriptors](https://pubs.acs.org/doi/abs/10.1021/acs.jpcc.9b08939), has been accepted by J. Phys. Chem. C and published online. In this work, Machine Learning algorithms were utilized to revise the conventional BEP relation in Methane Activation on Rutile Metal Oxides.
![](https://pubs.acs.org/na101/home/literatum/publisher/achs/journals/content/jpccck/2019/jpccck.2019.123.issue-47/acs.jpcc.9b08939/20191120/images/medium/jp9b08939_0009.gif)

title: New Website !
content:
Hi, I am a PhD student in Theoretical Catalysis and Computational Chemistry. 
My daily research is utilizing different state-of-the-art computational methods (QM, DFT, DFTB, ReaxFF) to study complex catalytic reactions at interfaces.
For the moment, I start a new website using HEXO to log my daily life.
